name: Pocket Rogues
description: Pocket Rogues is a dynamic Roguelike Action-RPG, played in real time from a top down 2D perspective. Raid endless dungeons, upgrade your guild fortress, and develop your own heroes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 820 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 149 MB available space
